wines.vintage_description: Cool, elegant vintage with spring rains and breezy summer, enhancing vibrant acidity
wines.olfactory_notes: Dried rose, raspberry, sweet spices, light smokiness
wines.gustatory_notes: Elegant, polished tannins, fresh citrusy finish

wines.vintage_description: Balanced vintage with warm days and cool nights, ideal for Nebbiolo's aromatic complexity
wines.olfactory_notes: Rose petal, wild cherry, licorice, crushed mint
wines.gustatory_notes: Structured yet refined, firm tannins, vibrant acidity, saline finish

wines.aging: 36 months in new French oak barriques followed by 24 months in bottle
wines.vintage_description: Exceptional vintage with optimal ripening conditions and perfect harvest timing allowing for concentrated fruit with balanced acidity and structure
wines.visual_notes: Deep impenetrable garnet-black with purple highlights and remarkable viscosity with pronounced legs
wines.olfactory_notes: Extraordinarily complex nose of blackberry jam, dark chocolate, black cherry liqueur, tobacco, espresso, cloves, leather, and balsamic notes with hints of dried figs and licorice
wines.gustatory_notes: Massively structured palate with exceptional concentration, velvety yet powerful tannins, remarkable balance despite high alcohol, multilayered dark fruit flavors with notes of chocolate, spice, and a nearly endless finish

wines.vintage_description: Favorable vintage with moderate temperatures and sufficient rainfall producing wines with bright acidity and expressive aromatics
wines.visual_notes: Pale straw yellow with green reflections, brilliant clarity and moderate viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Fresh and vibrant bouquet of green apple, citrus peel, white peach, jasmine flowers, with delicate hints of Mediterranean herbs and saline mineral notes
wines.gustatory_notes: Crisp and refreshing palate with pronounced acidity, medium body, clean citrus and stone fruit flavors, notable minerality, and a pleasantly persistent finish with almond nuances

wines.aging: 6 months in American oak barrels followed by 3 months in bottle
wines.vintage_description: Excellent vintage characterized by hot summer days and cool nights yielding perfectly ripened grapes with balanced sugar levels and phenolic maturity
food_pairings: hearty pasta dishes with meat sauce
wines.visual_notes: Deep ruby red with purple highlights and significant viscosity displaying pronounced legs
wines.olfactory_notes: Rich aromatic profile of ripe black cherries, blackberry jam, plum preserves, vanilla, cinnamon, and chocolate with undertones of Mediterranean herbs and sweet tobacco
wines.gustatory_notes: Full-bodied and velvety with well-integrated alcohol, moderate tannins, balanced acidity, concentrated dark fruit flavors, pleasant spice notes, and a warm, lingering finish with hints of licorice

wines.vintage_description: Favorable vintage with moderate temperatures and sufficient rainfall producing wines with bright acidity and expressive aromatics
wines.visual_notes: Pale straw yellow with green reflections, brilliant clarity and moderate viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Fresh and vibrant bouquet of green apple, citrus peel, white peach, jasmine flowers, with delicate hints of Mediterranean herbs and saline mineral notes
wines.gustatory_notes: Crisp and refreshing palate with pronounced acidity, medium body, clean citrus and stone fruit flavors, notable minerality, and a pleasantly persistent finish with almond nuances

wines.aging: 18 months in French oak barrels and 6 months in bottle
wines.vintage_description: Very good vintage with balanced growing conditions producing wines with excellent structure and aging potential
wines.visual_notes: Deep ruby red with garnet reflections and good viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Complex bouquet of black cherry, blackberry, violet, tobacco, leather, and earthy notes with hints of vanilla and Mediterranean herbs
wines.gustatory_notes: Full-bodied with firm tannins, vibrant acidity, dark fruit flavors balanced by savory mineral notes, and a long finish with spice and balsamic hints

wines.aging: 12 months in French oak barrels with 30% new oak
wines.vintage_description: Warm vintage with drought conditions yielding concentrated grapes with ripe fruit character and moderate acidity
wines.visual_notes: Deep ruby red with purple highlights and good viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Aromatic profile of black cherry, plum, blackberry jam, vanilla, and subtle spice notes with hints of violets and earth
wines.gustatory_notes: Medium to full-bodied with integrated tannins, bright acidity, rich dark fruit flavors, balanced oak influence, and a long, clean finish with subtle coffee notes

wines.aging: 24 months in large Slavonian oak casks
wines.vintage_description: Challenging vintage with early heat spikes but skillful winemaking preserved elegance and varietal character
wines.visual_notes: Garnet red with orange highlights at the rim and moderate viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Classic nose of dried rose petals, red cherry, tar, licorice, and forest floor with hints of violets and spice
wines.gustatory_notes: Medium-bodied with firm tannins, vibrant acidity, red fruit flavors complemented by earthy notes, and a long, elegant finish with mineral undertones

wines.aging: 30 months in large Slavonian oak casks
wines.vintage_description: Outstanding vintage with perfect weather conditions producing wines with exceptional balance, structure and aging potential
wines.visual_notes: Deep garnet red with brick-orange reflections and pronounced viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Complex bouquet of dried rose, cherry liqueur, truffle, leather, tobacco, and tar with hints of vanilla and balsamic notes
wines.gustatory_notes: Full-bodied with robust yet refined tannins, bright acidity, concentrated red fruit flavors layered with earthy notes, and an extraordinarily long, complex finish

wines.aging: 24 months in large Slavonian oak casks
wines.vintage_description: Challenging warm vintage with drought conditions yielding powerful wines with ripe tannins
wines.visual_notes: Garnet red with orange highlights and good transparency with moderate viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Aromatic profile of red cherry, rose petals, violet, licorice, and subtle notes of tobacco and spice
wines.gustatory_notes: Medium to full-bodied with firm tannins, bright acidity, red fruit flavors balanced by earthy notes, and a persistent finish with mineral undertones

wines.aging: 12 months in barriques followed by 12 months in large oak casks
wines.vintage_description: Exceptional vintage with perfect growing conditions producing wines with remarkable balance, structure and aging potential
wines.visual_notes: Brilliant garnet red with orange reflections and exceptional clarity and viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Extraordinarily complex nose of wild strawberry, rose petal, violet, truffle, leather, licorice, and mineral notes with subtle hints of spice and balsamic
wines.gustatory_notes: Elegant yet powerful with refined tannins, vibrant acidity, remarkable balance and depth, concentrated fruit flavors, and an exceptionally long, complex finish with mineral nuances

wines.vintage_description: Excellent vintage with ideal weather conditions resulting in perfectly ripened grapes with balanced acidity and sugar levels
wines.visual_notes: Deep ruby red with garnet highlights and pronounced viscosity with thick legs
wines.olfactory_notes: Rich bouquet of dried cherry, prune, raisin, chocolate, cinnamon, tobacco, and leather with hints of vanilla and balsamic notes
wines.gustatory_notes: Full-bodied with velvety tannins, balanced acidity despite high alcohol, concentrated dried fruit flavors, spice notes, and a long, warm finish with chocolate undertones

wines.vintage_description: Good vintage with some challenging weather conditions but resulting in concentrated wines with good structure
wines.visual_notes: Deep ruby red with garnet reflections and good viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Aromatic profile of dried cherry, blackberry jam, chocolate, cinnamon, leather, and tobacco with subtle vanilla notes
wines.gustatory_notes: Full-bodied with firm but integrated tannins, moderate acidity, rich dried fruit and spice flavors, and a long, warm finish with balsamic hints

wines.aging: 36 months in large Slavonian oak casks followed by 6 months in bottle
wines.vintage_description: Outstanding vintage with perfect growing conditions producing wines with exceptional balance, structure and aging potential
wines.visual_notes: Brilliant ruby red with garnet reflections and excellent viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Complex bouquet of ripe cherry, red berries, violet, leather, tobacco, and Mediterranean herbs with subtle vanilla and balsamic notes
wines.gustatory_notes: Elegant and powerful with firm but fine-grained tannins, bright acidity, concentrated red fruit flavors, savory mineral notes, and an exceptionally long, complex finish

wines.aging: 36 months in Slavonian oak casks and 12 months in bottle
wines.vintage_description: Exceptional vintage with ideal weather conditions producing perfectly balanced wines with great structure and aging potential
wines.visual_notes: Deep ruby red with garnet highlights and excellent viscosity
wines.olfactory_notes: Rich nose of ripe cherry, wild strawberry, violet, leather, tobacco, and forest floor with hints of spice and balsamic notes
wines.gustatory_notes: Full-bodied with firm yet elegant tannins, vibrant acidity, concentrated red fruit flavors, earthy undertones, and a long, complex finish with mineral nuances
